verses.name: Mark 15:17
verses.text: And they clothed him with purple, and platted a crown of thorns, and put it about his head,

verses.name: Mark 15:18
verses.text: And began to salute him, Hail, King of the Jews!

verses.name: Mark 15:19
verses.text: And they smote him on the head with a reed, and did spit upon him, and bowing their knees worshipped him.

verses.name: Mark 15:20
verses.text: And when they had mocked him, they took off the purple from him, and put his own clothes on him, and led him out to crucify him.
